ch.lambdaj.collection
Class LambdaGroup<T>

java.lang.Object
  ch.lambdaj.collection.LambdaGroup<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Group<T>
public class LambdaGroup<T>
extends Object
implements Group<T>

A wrapper of a group that returns LambdaLists instead of Lists in order to allow a fluent interface programming

Author:
Mario Fusco
